channel.title: Civil Air Patrol Today
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2006 Civil Air Patrol, Maryland Wing
channel.itunes:subtitle: Audio edition of Civil Air Patrol Today - news from the Maryland Wing
channel.itunes:author: Civil Air Patrol, Maryland Wing Public Affairs
channel.itunes:summary: Civil Air Patrol Today is a semi-weekly radio broadcast about the missions, activities, and opportunities of the Civil Air Patrol in Maryland. The Civil Air Patrol is the official civilian auxiliary of the United States Air Force. CAP's three mission areas are Emergency Services, Cadet Programs, and Aerospace Education. The show is hosted by First Lieutenant Steven Solomon and is produced by Major William Parris.
channel.description: Audio edition of Civil Air Patrol Today - news and topics from the Maryland Wing

item.title: Lt Cols Robert Ayres and Kevin Redman
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Lt Cols Robert Ayres and Kevin Redman, Incident Commanders in the Maryland Wing, discuss the search for an aircraft that dissappeared off radar in Southern Pennsylvania.

item.title: Middle School program at an aerospace magnet school
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Lt Col John Knowles, C/2d Lts Sascha Maraj and Colleen Vineer, and C/SMSgt Rachel Knowles talk about their participation in an after school program for students at the Parkland Middle School in Parkland, Maryland.

item.title: Cadet Second Class Eric W. Miller, USAFA
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Cadet Eric Miller is now a junior at the US Air Force Academy in Colorado. However, his preparation for an Air Force career began while a cadet in the Civil Air Patrol at Maryland's Glenn L. Martin Composite Squadron.

item.title: A training sortie in CAP's newest aircraft
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Come fly with the CAP in one if its newest, most advanced aircraft on an actual search and rescue training sortie. Guest host Maj Christian Ready speaks with pilot Maj Pete Loewenheim, co-pilot Capt Charlie Summers, and observers SM James Novitski and Rich Donoho.

item.title: Maj Gen Robert Smolen, USAF
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Maj Gen Robert Smolen, commander of the new Air Force District of Washington, talks about the AFDW's role in supporting the Air Force's mission at Bolling Air Force Base, and also discusses how Civil Air Patrol fits into the AFDW's and the USAF's mission as a whole.

item.title: 1st Lt Petra Joyce and C/Lt Col Jacob Reed
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: 1st Lt Petra Joyce and C/Lt Col Jacob Reed discuss their experiences in Civil Air Patrol, and how CAP performs services on behalf of the public.

item.title: C/Lt Beth Roberts
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Cadet Lieutenant Beth Roberts of the Harford Composite Squadron talks about her experience in the CAP cadet program. This episode was guest-produced by C/Lt Col Jacob Reed.

item.title: C/Capt Kevin Finson
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: C/Capt Kevin Finson talks about his experience at the Aerospace Academy, Engineering Academy, and his recent participation in the Civic Leadership Academy, where he was able to meet with Congressional leaders.

item.title: C/Maj Jake Reed and C/Amn Bo Saunders
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: C/Maj Jacob Reed and C/Amn Bo Saunders discuss their careers in CAP as cadets and their recent wins in the Maryland Wing cadet Speak off competition.

item.title: Lt Lotvedt, C/Lt Mowrey and C/Lt Watts
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: 1st Lt Karl Lotvedt, C/2d Lts Wayne Mowery and Casey Watts of the Osprey Composite Squadron talk about the Model Rocketry program.

item.title: Cadet Lieutenant Michael Strickland
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Cadet Lieutenant Mike Strickland, Emergency Services Officer in Group III of the Maryland Wing, discusses how he helped to clean up after hurricane Katrina in 2005.

item.title: Col Kay Joslin Walling
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Maryland Wing Commander Colonel Kay Joslin Walling joins us to discuss her vision for the Maryland Wing, and how the Wing is adapting to meet new demands for missions form the Air Force and the state of Maryland.

item.title: Maj Wes LaPre
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Major Wes LaPre, commander of Group III in the Maryland Wing, joins us to discuss his career in the Air Force's Strategic Air Command, and how his Air Force service led him to join the Civil Air Patrol and his current post in the Maryland Wing.

item.title: Maj Christian Ready
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Major Christian Ready returns to talk with Lieutenant Solomon to discuss the newly redesigned MD Wing web site and how podcasting is getting the Civil Air Patrol Today radio program out to a larger audience.

item.title: Capt Charles Goolsby and the Maryland Wing Band
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Capt Charles Goolsby, commander of the Chesapeake Bay Senior Squadron, talks with Lt Solomon about the Maryland Wing swing and fife and drum bands.

item.title: Lt Col Arthur Liberty
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Lieutenant Colonel Arthur Liberty, Deputy Commander for Group I in Maryland, talks with Lt Solomon about his recent training in Civil Air Patrol's (ARCHER) system and how this new system will greatley enhance CAP's Search and Rescue capabilities.

item.title: Maj Tim Strickland
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Major Tim Strickland, commander of the Arundel Composite Squadron in Maryland, talks with Lt Solomon about the role he played in Hurricane Katrina relief efforts in Mississippi and Louisiana in his civilian employment with the US Coast Guard.

item.title: Lt. Col. John Knowles and the Middle School Initiative program
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Maryland Group I commander Lt. Col. John Knowles talks with Lt. Solomon about Civil Air Patrol's Middle School Initiative program in Maryland.

item.title: Aerospace education with Capt Terry
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Capt. Robert Terry discusses the Civil Air Patrol mission to provide aerospace education resources to the public, in his role as the Maryland Wing's aerospace education officer.

item.title: 1st Lt. Philip Szczepanski
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: 1st Lt. Philip Szczepanski, public affairs officer of the Harford Composite Squadron, talks about his role as project officer for re-dedication of a memorial to two members of the Maryland Wing of the Civil Air Patrol who were killed in the line of duty.

item.title: Search and rescue excercise
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Join 1st Lt.. Solomon as he goes on location with the Maryland Wing on a search and rescue training excercise in Hagerstown, Md. Guests include Lt. Col. John Kilgallon, Lt. Col. Kevin Redman, Lt. Col. David Younce, and Maj. John Long.

item.title: Lt. Col. John Kilgallon
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Maryland Wing Vice Commander Lt. Col. John Kilgallon talks with 1st Lt. Solomon about the history of the Civil Air Patrol, its current organization, and how CAP is contributing to Homeland Defense.

item.title: Captain Joe Winter and Cadet Captain Jacob Reed
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Capt. Joe Winter, the Maryland Wing's director of cadet programs, and Cadet Capt. Jacob Reed, the Maryland Wing's administrative officer, discuss the Civil Air Patrol Cadet Program and how young adults like C/Capt. Reed can get a head start on their Air Force career.

item.title: Lt. Brenda Reed and Cadet Master Sgt. Glen Edwards
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: 2nd Lt. Brenda Reed and Cadet Master Sgt. Glen Edwards discuss opportunities for cadets in Civil Air Patrol, and how Cadet Edwards won first place in the Cadet Speak-Off competitions in the Maryland Wing and the Middle East Region.

item.title: Capt Doug Barth and Cadet Senior Airman Stacey MacManus
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Capt Doug Barth and Cadet Senior Airman Stacey MacManus of the Fort McHenry Composite Squadron talk with Lieutenant Solomon about their squadron's new Adopt-A-Highway project in cooperation with the Maryland State Highway Administration.

item.title: Lt Col Bob Ayres and Mr. Harry Spiker
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Lt Col Bob Ayres and Mr Harry Spiker talk with Lieutenant Solomon about how the Maryland Wing is helping the state of Maryland track wild bears.

item.title: Major Christian Ready
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Group 2 Deputy Commander & Information Technology Officer Major Christian Ready talks with Lieutenant Solomon about Maryland Wing's IT initiatives.

item.title: Major John Long
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Emergency Services Officer Major John Long talks with Lieutenant Solomon about Maryland Wing's emergency services missions, and how volunteers from accross Maryland contribute their skills to save lives.

item.title: Captain Timothy Hahn
item.itunes:author: First Lieutenant Steven Solomon
item.itunes:summary: Flight Operations Officer Captain Timothy Hahn talks with Lieutenant Solomon about Maryland Wing's 12 aircraft strategically placed at airports throughout the state.
